name: CODING CROSSWORD
discription:
Event Description: An event that has an interesting crossword to solve through basic concepts covered in the  initial years of Computer Engineering.For the next round, you’ll need to solve snippets of code and find the output for those to get to the answers of crossword.

Event Date: 15 October 2020
Event Time: 8:45-9:30
Event Platform: Google Classroom
Participate Mode- Single or team of 2

Event Rules: A two-round event which is completely online.
You need to solve a crossword using the clues based on basic computer and coding understanding
register: You can register solo or in team

name: LOGOCODIFY
discription:
LogoCodify is a technical event and it has two rounds:

Round 1- In the first round, participants have to combine the broken pieces of logo and note the matrix containing numbers written over the broken pieces.They then have to search and highlight this matrix in a much bigger table given at the end and they also have to type in the name of the logo in google forms.
Round 2(If shortlisted from Round 1)- In the second round, participants have to shorten the length of given code while keeping the given input and output same.

Event Date: 15th October 2020

Event Time: 
Round 1: 11:30 am to 12:30 am
Round 2: 2:00 pm to 3:00 pm
Event Platform: (Link will be provided) in W.A Group
Particiation Mode: Single

Event Rules
Round 1: Submit the answers in given time limit.
Round 2: Input and Output should not be changed.

name: DECODER'S HUNT
discription:
Event Description: An event where you will solve basic coding questions, presented to you with a twist.The second round will take you on a journey where at each station you will have to solve a pseudo code before you reach the destination.

Event Date: 15 October 2020
Event Time: Round 1: 10:00 am to 11:30 am
Round 2: 2:30 pm to 4:30 pm
Event Platform : Google Forms, Google Classroom, Google Meet
Participation Mode: Single

Round 1:
In the first round, participants have to solve the problems of logical reasoning and core understandingof coding. The questions will be encrypted. First decrypt the question and then solve the problem.Thiswill be time and score based qualifier round.The participants having maximum correct answers in minimum time will be qualified for the second round.
Round 2: 
At the beginning of the round the participants will be given a clue that will lead them to a problem set.Each problem set will have a question to solve and a clue to the next problem set. After reaching the final problem set, the participants will have to write a code from the data collected during this code-hunt. This is a time based round.Top 3 participants with correct answer in minimum time will be declared winners.

Rules:
1. Participants will have to submit the answers through google forms only.
2.Each participant can submit the form once only. Repeated entries will not be considered.
3.Top entries with the maximum score in minimum time will be qualified for the second round.
Those who are qualified for the second round will be contacted.
4. A password-protected pdf with details will be shared at the beginning of second round.
5.Both the rounds will be conducted separately.

name: RANGOLIFY
discription:
Event Description: The aim for this event is to create designs using Python's turtle module.

Event Date: 15 October 2020(Round 1)
Event Time: 1:30 to 2:30pm(Day 1)
Event Platform: Google Classroom and Google Quiz
Participation Mode: Single or Team of 2

Event Rules:Rangolify is a 2 rounds event. Round 1 is a quiz on turtle module of python. Shortlisted entries will go to round 2 where they have to code for the design provided.
register: You can register solo or in team

name: CODEMANIA
discription:
Event Description: So you think you can code? eh!..try your hands at the Ultimate Competitive Programming Battle.Love competitive programming? Get ready to show your skills in the coding race.

Event Date: 15th October
Event Time: 8:00pm to 12:00am
Event Platform: Hackerearth
Participation Mode: Single Participation

Event Rules:
This is a single round event which is completely online.Time Duration is of 4 hours with 6 Problem StatementsThere will be multiple questions of varying difficulties.Top 3 contestants will be on the podium of CODEMANIA. Any submissions after the allotted time will not be considered.No extra time will be provided for late entries.

name: GAMECHEFER
discription:
Wanna play a game? Yess! You can but let's make it first
Round 1 - develop any kind of logical game (can be any small logical game like sudoku but should be innovative)Top 5 game would be selected for next round (innovation main factor)
Round 2: it's play time, yess! One will play remaining 4 game and will put their reviews verbally in a Google meet (kind of debate)
Considering the correction of reviews and level of game to level of boggle of mind winners would be selected

Event Date: 15th-16th October 2020 
Event Platform: Google form/Google classroom 
Event Time:
Round 1: 8:30 am to 3:30 pm(15th October)(first round is submission round,just you have to submit your game code anytime in the given time interval) 
Round 2: 1:30 pm to 2:30 pm(16th October) 
Participation Mode: Single Participation
Event Rules:

 1. Participants can code in any language or use any platform of their choice
 2. The time duration will start as soon as the registration process terminates.
 3. The code should be ready 5 minutes before the submission time.
4. The theme of the game should be innovative and creative.
5. Plagiarism will not be tolerated. Those participants who are caught will be disqualified.(Required time)
6.For second round Reviews of games(other’s) should be actual.
register: You can register solo or in team

name: ABHIVYAKTI
discription:
Event Description: Abhivyakti is a 3 round event emphasized on Diction skills as well as critical thinking. This event will brush up the skills that are required while giving a speech, presenting a presentation, having a debate and also engaging in a conversation.
Round 1 is a riddle round. If selected round 2 is a Debate Round and further if shortlisted round 3 is about Podcast Talk.

Event Date: 15th October
Event Time: 9:30 to 10:00am(Round 1)
Event Platform: Google Forms and Google Meet
Participation Mode: Team of 2

Event Rules:
This is a three round event which is completely online.Time Duration for the 1st round is 30 minutes and is all about solving riddles and brain teasers. Participants must join the provided platforms at given time. Joining information and redirect links will be provided later once registered. Details about round 2 and 3 will be discussed with the selected participants.

name: CODE THE HINTS
discription:
Event Description: How about a game where coding is too simple but what matters is your observation. Observe the images,Collect the Hints, and Code!!

Event Date: 16th October 2020
Event Time: 8:30pm to 10:30am
Event Platform: Hackerearth
Participation Mode- Single

Event Rules:
This is a single round event which is completely online.
Time Duration is of 2 hours with 20 Images as Problem Statements

name: INNOTECH
discription:
This event is basically related to innovative, business or any startup ideas. In this event the participants will get a platform to present any innovative ideas that they have, may it be in terms of any innovative business idea or any unique project that they have in their mind.

Event Date: 15 October 2020(Round 1)
Event Time: 8:30 to 2:30pm(Round 1)You can submit the Entries any time in this interval.
Event Platform: Google Classroom and Google Meet
Participation Mode: Team of 3

Event Rules:
Innotech is a 3 round event. For round 1, participants will have to submit the abstract of their idea in the classroom in form of pdf (Link of classroom will be provide after successfull registration) . Selection ofthe teams would be done on the basis of innovative and unique idea. All participants willreceive 2 E-certificate.One certificate from college and another from the company.If selected for round 2, participants would have to present their ideas to jury members virtually. On the basis of your presentation and idea, participants will be selected for next round. For round 3 participants have to make innovative marketing posters or video's for marketing purpose.Timings and details for round 2 and 3 would be provided when got selected.
register: You can register solo or in team

name: SCAVENGER HUNT
discription:
Scavenger Hunt is a non-technical event,In this game Puzzles will be given to participants. They have to solve it and find Answer(object or place) and click the picture of that and upload it. All the answer(object or place) will easily available at home, so participants Don’t need to go outside.

Event Date: 16 October 2020
Event Time: Round 1: 11:00 am to 12:30 am
Event Platform: Google Form/Google classroom 
Participation Mode: Single

Event Rules:
Only original pictures are valid. Don’t send pictures from google or anywhere.Time will be considered. i.e. The participant, who will solve puzzles in less Time will be consider as a winner.

name: VALORANT
discription:
Event Description:A 5v5 character-based tactical FPS,PC game where precise gun play meets unique agent abilities. where one team attacks and the other defends.The attacking team’s goal is to plant a bomb (called a spike) and have it detonate.

Event Date: 15-16 October 2020
Event Time: 8:30 to 5:00pm(Day 1)
Event Time: 8:30 to 2:30pm(Day 2)
Event Platform: Meet and Valorant
Participation Mode: Team of 5

Event Rules:
Participants must have the riot Id of all members,Discord

name: THE WATCH CRAFT
discription:
The Event is Non-Technical and the Event is on Streaming Movies and TV-Series (Binge Watching).We will have questions based on Popular Movies & TV-Series such as Dialogues, Characters, Intro, Music, Casts, etc.We will have 3 Rounds and after the progression of each round the number of participants is reduced to half and the three fastest performers in Round 3 will be declared as a Winners.Event Type: Single Participation

Event Date: 15 October 2020
Event Time: 
Round 1: 8:30 am to 11:00 am
Round 2: 1:30 pm to 3:00 pm
Round 3: 4:00 pm to 5:00 pm
Event Platform: Website(Link will be provided)

Event Rules-
Round 1:
 This round will be open for all participants for 30 minutes. You can login during this time and answer the quiz question as mention. you have 2 minutes to answer the given questions.More score and least time consider first.50% of participants will go for the next round .
Details of Round 2 and 3 will be provided later to selected ones.
